extendedInfo.description: A simple ad-free timer for Instrument pilots, also useful for all pilots and as a simple household timer.Basic functions include:- Count down timer in seconds.- Count down in degrees ("S.Rt.") for Standard Rate turns, useful in making a 180 degree turn for example.- One minute punch in for hold patterns.- Option to use any phone button to start/stop.- Vibration alert.- Tone alert.- Maximum time out of 100 minutes.

reviews.title: Perfect simple timer, ad-free!
reviews.comment: Finally a handy simple timer that\'s free, no ads, and perfect for IFR or VFR pilots in the cockpit and also useful around home or anywhere. Thank you!
reviews.author: John W

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you for providing apps for android pilots.
reviews.author: Andrew Martin
